EmailTemplate.name: Onan Parts Stock List
EmailTemplate.subject: Onan Parts Stock List
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good Morning All,
Attached price and availability,
The prices contained in this email and/or its attachment(s) are current to the date of this email and are subject to change.
As an authorised Cummins dealer, you agree to comply with the Cummins Fair Competition and Trade Practices Policy, available upon request.
The information contained in this email and its attachments is classified as Cummins Restricted Confidential and must be treated as set out below.
In consideration of Cummins making available its Cummins Restricted Confidential Information to you, you agree that: (a) You will only use this information for the purpose of your dealership agreement with Cummins or any other purposes expressly agreed in writing by Cummins; (b) You must keep all of Cummins Restricted Confidential Information strictly confidential and not disclose it to any third party without Cummins’ prior written consent; (c) You may only disclose Cummins’ Restricted Confidential Information to those of your officers, employees or contractors who need to know and who have expressly directed to and have agreed to keep that information confidential; (d) You must put in place and maintain adequate security measures to protect Cummins Restricted Confidential Information from unauthorised access or use; (e) You must immediately notify Cummins of any suspected or actual unauthorised use, copying or disclosure of Cummins Restricted Confidential Information and provide assistance as reasonably required by Cummins in relation to any steps or proceedings Cummins may take as a result; (f) not copy Cummins Restricted Confidential Information without Cummins’ prior written consent and mark all copies as Cummins Restricted Confidential; (g) immediately notify Cummins if you are required by law to disclose any Cummins Restricted Confidential Information and provide assistance as reasonably required by Cummins if Cummins wishes to defend or resist that requirement; and (h) on request by Cummins at any time, immediately return to Cummins or permanently delete or destroy, as Cummins reasonably directs, all copies or records of the Cummins Restricted Confidential Information in your possession or control. You agree that these obligations bind your company or business and that any breach of these obligations by an officer, employee or contractor of your company or business will be deemed to be a breach of these obligations by your company or business. You agree that you do and will fully indemnify Cummins in relation to any loss, costs, damages or expenses (including full legal expenses) that Cummins may suffer or incur as a result, directly or indirectly, of any breach of these confidentiality obligations by you, your company or business and any of its officers, employees or contractors.
Regards Cummins Support Centre
Phone (Australia) 1300Cummins Phone (New Zealand) 0800Cummins Fax 1300 286 600 cummins.com 1300cummins@cummins.com
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail, including any attachments, is for the exclusive and confidential use of the intended recipient(s). If you are not an intended recipient, please do not read, distribute or take action in reliance upon this message. If you have received this in error, please notify the sender immediately by return e-mail and promptly delete this message and its attachments from your computer system.
